content: Take this Grasstop Grotto <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>. You're in charge of choosing where the new Neighbor will live.
info: 莫白主引入语 - 发房子背包没满_莫白主引入语

content: Once you've picked a spot, I'll let the new Neighbor know they can move in, and we'll welcome them at the Camp!
info: 莫白主引入语 - 发房子背包没满_莫白主引入语
